column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////I didn't see anything too fabulous jump out at me on the menu
column3: so I just went with the bosscat burger.  For $15
column5: but not nearly worth the money
column6: especially since it doesn't come with fries or any sides.  My dining companion ordered the pork belly poutine
column7: which was delicious as well.  Although there is not all that much pork belly in the dish....mostly the hearty gravy and cheese curds
column8: it's still a delicious take on poutine.
